parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Takata Airbag Recall Notification and Repair Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to notify vehicle owners of the Takata airbag recall and the unavailability of repair parts can lead to a delay in necessary repairs, potentially causing injuries or fatalities in the event of an airbag deployment.
symptoms: Vehicle owners not receiving recall notifications
dealerships not having repair parts available
inability to schedule repairs
and lack of communication from manufacturers and dealerships.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Mazda Dealership Communication and Service Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Poor communication and service from Mazda dealerships can lead to frustration and delays in resolving issues, potentially causing inconvenience and safety risks to vehicle owners.
symptoms: Dealerships not responding to customer inquiries
lack of transparency about repair timelines
and unavailability of loaner vehicles.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake booster can cause the brake pedal to feel hard or spongy, leading to a loss of braking power, which can result in accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels hard or spongy
the brake pedal has to be pressed to the floor to stop the vehicle
the vehicle takes longer to stop than usual
a hissing sound is heard when the brake pedal is pressed
the brake pedal becomes stiff and difficult to depress.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake light switch can cause the brake lights to malfunction, leading to a potential accident or collision.
symptoms: The brake lights may or may not come on when the brake pedal is pressed
the brake lights are intermittent.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake master cylinder can cause the brake pedal to feel soft or spongy, leading to a loss of braking power, which can result in accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal has to be pressed to the floor to stop the vehicle
the vehicle takes longer to stop than usual.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transfer case can cause the vehicle to lose acceleration, shudder, or hesitate, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Whining or rattling sounds from the transmission
loss of acceleration
shuddering or hesitation when accelerating
metallic clunking sounds
humming noise from the front wheel
and oil leaks.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the torque converter can cause the vehicle to shudder or hesitate, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Shuddering or hesitation when accelerating
especially at certain highway speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the differential can cause the vehicle to lose traction and stability, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Humming noise from the front wheel
uneven tire wear
and squealing or skirting sounds when turning corners.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS and TCS systems can cause the vehicle to lose braking ability and traction, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: ABS light staying on constantly
gritty feeling when pumping the brakes
and TCS light illumination.
